Text:
Hmm... was testing it and it gets stuck at 1:03, played it at MPCH and KMPlayer image/sound freezes, but timer keeps running, if let it go it returns like 2 mins later.

Then i tested going backwards... jumping to the 2:00 minute and going back 5secs at a time i made it back to 1:08 and got stuck again.. so the problem is from 1:03 to 1:08, so i ask, is it only me??????

btw the A/V is perfect quality

DISREGARD my previous comment ( it was a download error.. don't know why uTorrent kept downloading if it had error)

This is completely OK
Does anyone know what audio codec is required for this MKV file? Great picture quality but no audio. Pls help
Codec is required for this MKV file, here: http://www.cccp-project.net/
